Subject: did you catch this note from Joe?
Body: Did you catch this email from Joe? He emailed you because tonight's deadline is really important. If you've been planning to make your first donation, please do so before tonight's midnight end-of-month deadline: recipientFirstName, Here's how I see it: Our country is locked in a battle for the soul of this nation. In the two years since I left the White House, we've seen this Administration praise neo-Nazis and white supremacists and rip families apart at the border. This isn't who we are. I want to get this country back on track, but I can't do it without your support. Our campaign's first end of month deadline is less than 24 hours away and my team tells me we need to raise $75,000 more to hit our goal. recipientFirstName, that's why I'm reaching out to you personally. Can you chip in $5 or whatever you can afford? ++HYPERLINK++ Folks, I can honestly say that I am more optimistic today than when I got elected to the United States Senate as a 29-year old kid. There is no reason we can't own the 21st century. We just have to get out of our own way and remember who we are. We're Americans: tough, resilient, but always full of hope. It's time to treat each other with dignity. Build a middle class that works for everybody. Fight back against the incredible abuses of power we're seeing. It's time to dig deep and remember that our best days still lie ahead. recipientFirstName, together, we will restore this version of America. I promise you that. But the strength of this movement depends on you. Can you stand with me and chip in $5? ++HYPERLINK++ I hope you will join me on this journey. It's time for a new day in America. - Joe ---- PAID FOR BY BIDEN FOR PRESIDENT This email was sent to TestBro1745@gmail.com. To unsubscribe, go to: ++HYPERLINK++

Subject: Trump's Tweet
Body: We didn't want this to take away from our exciting launch day, but yesterday Donald Trump hurled insults at our campaign and Democratic colleagues: Trump's Tweet yesterday This is beneath the office of the Presidency. Tweets like this are a reminder of why we cannot afford for more years of this President. And this is exactly why we can't let Donald Trump have 4 more years in office. Joe is running a different kind of campaign. But if President Trump is already on the attack on Day One, we need to be prepared for whatever comes next. So recipientFirstName, will you chip in so we can defend ourselves against Trump's attacks? DONATE $5 >> DONATE $25 >> DONATE $50 >> DONATE $100 >> DONATE $250 >> DONATE OTHER >> recipientFirstName, you know we plan on running a campaign that is focused on a positive, forward-looking vision for the American people. We have a lot of respect for the other Democratic candidates in this race. This primary will be about issues, policies, and getting America back on track. None of those ideas are "demented" or "sick." The only person who would be making this campaign "nasty" is Donald Trump himself. So listen, the attacks have already started. It's never been more important for our campaign to show strength in numbers. We need you with us, can you help us respond to Donald Trump's tweet with a donation of any amount? DONATE $5 DONATE $25 DONATE $50 DONATE $100 DONATE $250 OTHER www.JoeBiden.com/Donate Let's send a message. Biden for President ---- PAID FOR BY BIDEN FOR PRESIDENT This email was sent to TestBro1745@gmail.com. To unsubscribe, go to: ++HYPERLINK++

Subject: introducing myself, recipientFirstName
Body: Please read this memo from our campaign manager about our campaign strategy and if you can, chip in to help us meet our April goal >> www.JoeBiden.com/Donate recipientFirstName, I wanted to introduce myself. I'm Greg Schultz, and I'm Joe Biden's campaign manager. This has been an exciting week! The response to our campaign has been amazing. I wanted to thank you for being on the team and making this campaign possible. Together, we raised the highest Day One total of any candidate in the field. We showed that there is grassroots excitement for Joe Biden and a place for him in this race to offer ideas, policies, and a plan to restore the soul of America. Here's the good news: Voters know Joe Biden. They know he will fight for the middle-class and working folks. They know he has taken on the NRA -- twice -- and won. They know he will bring climate change to the forefront of the conversation. And they know that he is a leader that is respected on the world stage. But here's what we're up against: There are a lot of candidates in the field, and with a crowded field we need to be on the ground and online talking directly to voters about the issues they care about. And to do that, we need to raise $1,200,000 more before our April 30 fundraising deadline, which is why I am writing to you today. Will you chip in to invest in our plan to build a strong grassroots operation in states across the country? Click the buttons below to make a donation: www.JoeBiden.com/Donate Joe is not taking anything for granted in this election. The donations we receive in April will go towards hiring staff in early states and making sure that we can catch up with programs that have been building for months. He wants to build a program that wins by talking to every last voter and having as many personal conversations as he can. We're not relying on his name alone. So recipientFirstName, in order to build this kind of program we need all of our supporters from the very beginning. Will you chip in today to help fund a winning strategy across the country? www.JoeBiden.com/Donate Thanks for reading. More to come. Greg Greg Schultz Campaign Manager Biden for President---- PAID FOR BY BIDEN FOR PRESIDENT This email was sent to TestBro1745@gmail.com. To unsubscribe, go to: ++HYPERLINK++
